text:
Mee rebus was decent. Kuah was lacking in flavor. 3.5*

Both sardine and potato curry puffs are offered and of very good quality. 4.5*

Ordered a takeaway mee rebus and asked for sambal chilli to be added into the mee rebus as I preferred.my mee rebus with sambal chilli rather than cut green chilli. Was told that sambal chilli don't come along with mee rebus and an add on of 50 cents for the scoop of chilli into my mee rebus. I forgo it as 50 cents for a scoop is ridiculous.
Very good mee rebus here. Not forgetting their curry puffs - sardine and potatoes. Friendly folks. The guy looks like @jokowi
mee rebus gravy too much flour. ask for more black sauce to perfect with the green chilli. yummy
Love the sambal fried rice and mee rabus. On weekend and holiday, they sell home made curry puff.
